Posts.Title: How Many Are We? zarovka SimonH

Posts.Content: Sep 18, 2018 09:41AM - edited Sep 18, 2018 09:42AM by Bridget19 Hi All - Long time lurker, been reading here since my dx in 2015. This place has really helped me realize that life doesn't end with a stage iv dx. I started Kadcyla 6 weeks ago and just had my third dose last Wednesday. Was on Taxotere, Herceptin and Perjeta for 3,5 years and had a good run. Must say that I tolerate Kadcyla much better than THP. The only side effect is fatigue for 6-7 days after the infusion, but that's it. The food is tasting good again, no diarrhea and my hair starts growing back! The next scans are scheduled for october, but since the last blood result showed my CA 15-3 dropped from 60 to 36 and CEA from 26 to 6 I'm cautiously optimistic.
Posts.Title: Who's on Kadcyla/TDM1? Trish03 Denny123

Posts.Content: Mar 18, 2016 02:28PM Bridget19 wrote: Hi everyone! Another newbie here. Was dx stage IV from the get go in March 2015 with mets to liver and lungs. Chemo did shrink the primary tumor and the mets substantually and I am currently stable on Herceptin and Perjeta. Very grateful to hear from all you long time survivors :)
